title: Soul of a Hunter
description: One savage night, and the rest of Sabra’s life was spent with vengeance burning in her soul. She knew the killer, but who were the extra players in a growing mystery?One cold, bloody night, and he’d found her again. Given a second chance, could Cam convince her to exchange vengeance for love?B00H6J54RC Alternate Cover Edition
author: Angela Verdenius
